resources.string: You need to request an access token first
to playce it on the map
This button will be working soon!
The list will be shown on the map (intent)
The playcelist will start playing on Spotify
The song will be shown on the map (intent)
The song will start playing on Spotify

To create a playcelist, zoom and pan the to an area of your choice. Then click the plus-button on the bottom left corner. 

All Songs visible on the map at that point will be added to a playlist on your Spotify Account and will then appear here. 

You will be able to view the extent of the playcelists on the map or start playing it on Spotify.

To playce the song currently playing on Spotify at your current GPS location, tap the plus-button on the bottom right corner of the map. 

If you want to playce the song somewhere else, find the place on the map and longclick. 

All playced songs will appear on the map and here. 

You will be able to zoom to the location of a song on the map or start playing it on Spotify.
